[\[21b.4\]]rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par 'jug ste/_snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sems can rnams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sku kun du gnas so/_/sku ji snyed pa de snyed kyi gsung dang /_gsung ji snyed pa de
[\[21b.5\]]snyed kyi thugs kun du gnas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par 'byung ba yin no/_/sku mi zad pa'i bkod pa la sogs pa bstan pa 'dis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i rang gi ngo bo rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_thabs yang dag par bstan pas sems can yongs su dag pa byang chub
[\[21b.6\]]sems dpa' kun du bzang po la sogs pa'i don mdzad pa yin no/_/yongs su ma dag pa thub pa dang mi dang lha dang lha ma yin dang dri za la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag ni de'i mi zad pa bkod pa gsum gyi ngo bo rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas mthong ba'i lam du mi 'jug ste/_de'i phyir de dag la phan
[\[21b.7\]]gdags pa'i ched du rgyud 'di las de'i sku la sogs pa bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi mtshan mar byin gyis brlabs nas bstan te/_'di ltar de dag gis de'i sku la sogs pa bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi ngo bor gyur pa yang
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]de dag mnyes par byed pa'i sbyor bas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye bar bstan pa dag kho nas mnyes par bya ste/_'bras bu legs par nges pa dang mngon par mtho ba ston par 'gyur ro/_/de'i mtshan ma yang rgyu dang ngo bo nyid dang 'bras bu'i mtshan ma'i bye brag gis
[\[22a.2\]]rnam pa gsum yin no/_/de la 'di'i rgyu ni mngon sum dang brgyud pa'i rgyu'i ngo bo nyid gnyis kyi bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis te/_de la 'di'i brgyud pa'i rgyu ni 'jig rten pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang sangs rgyas dang /_rdzogs par byang chub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang bzhi'i bye brag
[\[22a.3\]]gis shes par bya'o/_/mngon sum gyi rgyu ni rdzogs par byang chub pa dang chos kyi sku'o/_/rnam par sprul pa 'di'i ngo bo nyid ni ji skad du/_mtshan nyid sngar bshad pa yin no/_/'di'i 'bras bu ni thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can thams cad gdul ba la sbyor ba dag yin no/_/de lta
[\[22a.4\]]bas na rgyud 'di las rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa 'di byin gyis rlob pa na ngo bo nyid du gsum po de 'di dag dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan mar bstan pa'i sgo nas ci rigs par byin gyis brlab par rjes su dpag pa'o/_/de la sku bkod pa
[\[22a.5\]]byin gyis rlob pa ni 'di las snying rje chen pos 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas dngos su bstan te/_de las ni dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor ba'i sgo nas lha'i sku gzugs dag kho nar dgod par gsungs te/_'di skad du/_de yi snying po dbus su ni/_/rgyal mchog gtso bo gser gyi mdog_/'bar
[\[22a.6\]]bcas thor tshugs dbu rgyan can/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /_mgon po yi ni byang phyogs su/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po ni/_/pad+ma dkar po'i stan la 'dug_/dung dang kun+da zla 'dra la/_/mgo la 'od dpag med bzhugs shing /_/bzhin ni bag tsam 'dzum pa bri/_/zhes bya
[\[22a.7\]]ba la sogs pa dang /_mgon po rnam snang mdzad chen gyi/_/lho yi phyogs su rdo rje 'dzin/_/re ba thams cad skong byed pa/_/mdog ni pri yang+ku lta bur/_/ljang ser ram ni margad ltar/_/sngo bsangs mgon po dbu rgyan can/_/sems dpa' chen po rgyan kun gyis/_/rnam par brgyan
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]cing mtha' yas par/_/'jug pa rgya chen rdo rjer bcas/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher 'byung ste/_snying rje chen po'i snying po can gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa las rig par bya'o/_/gsung mi zad pa bkod pa byin gyis rlob pa yang 'di las dngos su yi ge'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i
[\[22b.2\]]dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bstan te/_'di ltar der ni dkyil 'khor du lha rnams phyag rgya dag gam sa bon gyi yi ge dag tu dgod par bshad do/_/'di skad du yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa las dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
[\[22b.3\]]gzugs dang phyag rgya dang sa bon gyi yi ge rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig tu dgod par yang dag par brjod nas/_de las gzhan pa rnams phyag rgya'am sa bon gyi yi ge dag tu dgod par bstan par 'byung ste/_de skad du shar phyogs su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yi ge a zhes bya ba
[\[22b.4\]]klad kor dang bcas pa ste/_aM me'i phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'am/_yi ge ka bri ste ka de bzhin du dkyil 'khor bstan pa 'di las ni gzhan du yang phal cher sa bon gyi yi ge dag kho nar bstan to/_/de bzhin du gsang ba'i
[\[22b.5\]]dkyil 'khor ni thugs mi zad pa bkod pa bsdus nas bstan te/_'di ltar gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du lha rnams phyag rgya'i khyad par rang gi rnam par thar pa'i don gyi rjes su byed pa pad+ma dang rdo rje la sogs pa dag dang /_de bzhin du me'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rang gi sems snang
[\[22b.6\]]ba'i khyad par me dang rlung dang sa dang chu'i dkyil 'khor dgod pa dag gis dgod par 'byung ste/_gsang ba'i bdag po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba mdog dung lta bu'i dbus su ni/_sangs rgyas kun gyi gru gsum pa/_/pad+ma
[\[22b.7\]]dkar po'i steng na 'dug_/klad kor bcas pa'i mtshan gyis btab/_/rdo rje'i mtshan ma rnams kyis mtshan/_/dpyad mi dgos pa kun nas ni/_/'od zer dag ni gnyis bya ba/_/gsang sngags mgon las byung nas su/_/de ni phyogs bcu rnams su song /_/zhes bya ba dang /_de
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]bzhin 'jig rten mgon gyi ni/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor ni/_/de las nan tan mnyan par gyis/_/kun du gru bzhi lham pa la/_/dbus su dung 'dra gzhag par bya/_/de yi steng du pad+ma ni/_/sa bon bcas byas rgyas par bri/_/de yi steng du rdo rje
[\[23a.2\]]che/_/rdo rje las kyang pad+ma che/_/thams cad sa bon rnams kyis mtshan/_/rang gi sa bon legs par sbyor/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin te/_rgyas par gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa las khong du chud par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor 'di gsum yang grangs bzhin
[\[23a.3\]]du sku gsung ba la sogs pa'i gsum bsdus par gyur pa yin par bshad mod kyi/_'on kyang sku med pa'am gsung med la/_thugs kyang phal cher sku med par med pas dkyil 'khor re re la yang sku la sogs pa gsum char byin gyis rlob par rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin du dkyil 'khor
[\[23a.4\]]gsum char la yang phal che ba'i phyir/_la lar sku dang gsung dang thugs dag byin gyis rlob par gyur na gzugs dang phyag rgya dang sa bon rnams bkod pa yang snang ngo /_/de bzhin du 'di las rim pa mdor bsdus pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa gzhan dag kyang
[\[23a.5\]]'di'i rgyud phyi ma las bshad pa gsang ba'i rim par phye ba la sogs pa las blta bar bya ste/_de dag tu yang dgongs pa ni 'di nyid yin par khong du chud par bya'o/_/yang sku la sogs pa bkod pa 'di nyid las sgrub pa po rnams las bzlas brjod yan lag bzhi pa la sogs pa ston par lha
[\[23a.6\]]sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs la sogs pa nang dang phyi rol du gyur pa bsam gtan bya ba'i sgo nas bstan te/_'di las ji skad du/_yi ge dang ni yi ger sbyar/_/de bzhin bzhi las bzhir gyur pa/_/shin tu bsdams pas yid la ni/_/bzlas brjod 'bum
[\[23a.7\]]phrag gcig bya'o/_/zhes bya ba dang /_yi ge byang chub sems yin te/_/gnyis pa sgra zhes bya ba yin/_/gzhi ni rang gi lha gzhag pa/_/rang gi lus kyi gnas la bya/_/gzhi gnyis pa ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/rkang gnyis mchog tu shes par bya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]rnam dag pa/_/sngags pas de la gnas par bsam/_/yi ge rnams ni go rims bzhin/_/de yi dbus su legs par dgod/_/ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu yin no/_/de bzhin du ri mo'i sku gzugs dang sku gzugs kyi rnam pa byin gyis rlob pa'i sgo nas kyang khong du
[\[23b.2\]]chud par bya'o/_/gsung mi zad pa bkod pa yang 'di las gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi sa bon gyi yi ge byin gyis rlob pa'i sgo nas bstan par snang ste/_'di ltar gsang sngags dag ni/_na maH sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAn/_AH bi ra hUM khaM/_zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /_na maH sa man+ta
[\[23b.3\]]bud+d+hA nAn/_a sa me tri sa me sa ma ye swA hA/_zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no/_/rig sngags kyi sa bon gyi yi ge dag ni/_a A aM aH/_zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no/_/de bzhin du thugs mi zad pa bkod pa yang /_lag pa'i phyag rgya dgod pa dang bri ba'i phyag rgya dgod pa'i sgo
[\[23b.4\]]nas bstan par blta bar bya'o/_/de ltar na sku la sogs pa bkod pa 'di'i rgyu dang ngo bo nyid dang 'bras bu'i mtshan ma yang 'di las de lta bu la sogs pa bstan pa las blta bar bya'o zhes bshad pa yin no/_/rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa'i bsdus pa'i don ni
[\[23b.5\]]'di las rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /_rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang sa bon gyi ngo bo mnyes par byed pa'i sgo nas rang bzhin gyis don 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/_sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi spyod pa can la sogs pa'i gsang sngags
[\[23b.6\]]bstan pa yin no/_/spyod pa de yang rnam pa gnyis te/_de la gcig ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la yang dag par bstan pa yin no/_/de las gzhan pa ni rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags la sogs pa bstan pa'i mtshan nyid yin te/_ci rigs par rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang nas rig
[\[23b.7\]]par bya'o/_/de la dkyil 'khor gyi chog la yang dag par bstan pa ni 'dir rnam pa bcu bzhis bstan te/_'di lta ste/_slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi sa bstan pa dang /_de yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /_de'i byin gyis rlob pa'i cho ga dang /_
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]slob ma'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /_slob ma sta gon du gnas pa'i cho ga bstan pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa'i cho ga brjod pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa la sogs pa rnam par dbye ba dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi tshon gyi mtshan nyid dang /_de dgye
[\[24a.2\]]ba la sogs pa'i cho ga bstan pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams nye bar bya ba'i sbyor ba dang /_de dag mchod pa'i cho ga'i yan lag bstan pa dang /_slob ma gzung ba'i cho ga bstan pa dang /_de dbang bskur ba'i cho ga brjod pa dang /_mes bya ba'i cho ga bstan pa bcu bzhi
[\[24a.3\]]yin no/_/de la slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid ni/_slob dpon nyid du 'jug pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_grub pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum mo/_/de la slob dpon nyid du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ni snying rje can sgyu rtsa la dag la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[24a.4\]]pa'i tshul la rtag tu mkhas pa theg pa gsum gyi khyad par shes pa gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi don la mkhas pa bsam pa shes pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dad pa la sogs pa yin no/_/slob dpon nyid du mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid
[\[24a.5\]]zab pa dang mi zab pa'i bye brag gi sgo nas te/_gsang sngags phyag rgya rtog shes pa'i/_/slob dpon rnam pa gnyis zhes bya/_/zab dang mi zab bye brag gis/_/de yi mtshan nyid shes par bya/_/zab mo rgya cher shes par bya/_/lus can rnams ni yid mi rton/_/sangs rgyas
[\[24a.6\]]rnams kyi sras mchog ste/_/mthong ba'i chos ni rnam par spangs/_/gnyis pa mthong ba'i chos rnams kyis/_/mos par gyur pa dmigs pa can/_/sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog rnams kyis/_/'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor kun/_/de yis bri bar bya ba'i phyir/_/
[\[24a.7\]]rjes su gnang zhing dbang yang bskur/_/zhes gang gsungs pa yin te/_slob dpon dmigs pa can mngon par 'du byas pa 'di ni gnyis pa yin no/_/slob dpon gyi thabs bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ni/_'di las rnam pa gnyis su bstan te/_'di lta ste/_snying rje chen po'i snying po
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]can dang /_yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i slob dpon du dbang bskur ba dang /_gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dri bar dbang bskur ba yin te/_sangs rgyas rnams kyis mdor na ni/_/dam tshig can rnams sngar bshad de/_/dkyil 'khor 'di ni mthong ba las/_/
[\[24b.2\]]dam tshig shes pa gcig ces bya/_/de la phyag rgya mi bstan cing /_/sngags kyang sbyin par mi bya'o/_/byang chub sems kyi bye brag las/_/sngags dang phyag rgya yongs su bzung /_/dkyil 'khor mthong zhes bya ba 'di/_/dam tshig can gnyis shes par bya/_/dkyil 'khor dang ni
[\[24b.3\]]phyag rgya mthong /_/las dang bya ba la yang sbyar/_/bla mas lung ni ma byin pa/_/de yang dam tshig shes par bshad/_/phyag rgya dkyil 'khor bri ba rnams/_/de tshe cho ga bzhin bstan na/_/gsang ba'i ye shes 'byung ba yi/_/dbang bskur med pa'i sngags pa min/_/gsang ba'i
[\[24b.4\]]dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/sngags pa cho gas dbang bskur ba/_/dam tshig shes pa sngar shes bya/_/dam tshig can zhes gzhan mi bya/_/zhes gang gsungs pa yin no/_/de lta bas na rim pa 'dis ni dkyil 'khor gsum gyi slob dpon nyid kyi thabs thob pas dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i
[\[24b.5\]]tshe rig pa'i rgyal mo yan lag bcu gnyis pa 'byung bas sngar bsnyen pa bya ste/_ji skad du/_dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngon rol du/_/bya ba rnams ni nges pas nyon/_/so so'i las rnams 'dod pa yis/_/tshul shes pas ni ci rigs par/_/rang gi ting 'dzin la gnas te/_/rig sngags
[\[24b.6\]]rgyal po stobs po che/_/yan lag bcu gnyis tshig 'byung ba/_/go rims bzhin du bzlas brjod bya/_/zhes gsungs pa lta bu yin no/_/de'i phyir slob ma byang chub kyi sems shin tu goms pa dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon nyid du gyur pa'ang rung /_byang chub kyi sems ma goms pa nyid
[\[24b.7\]]kyis dmigs pa can yang rung ste/_dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i tshe rig pa'i rgyal po yan lag bcu gnyis pa 'byung ba sngar bsnyen pa bya'o zhes bstan par 'gyur ro/_/rang gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas te zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa ni/_slob dpon rang gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas te/_rig pa'i
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]rgyal po 'di bzlas brjod bya'o zhes bshad par 'gyur pa 'di yin no/_/na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/_a sa man+ta d+harmA d+hA tu kar+ya ga ti ga tA nAn sarba thA/_AM khAM aM aH/_saM sa haM ha raM ra baM ba swA hA/_haM ha swA hA/_raM ha swA hA/_rig pa'i rgyal po tshig yan lag bcu
[\[25a.2\]]gnyis 'byung ba yin no/_/slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid kyang bshad pa ni 'di yin no/_/bdag nyid a zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur byin gyis brlab pa la yi ge'i 'khor lo mtha' dag rang gi lus la dgod de/_ka ni lkog mar shes par bya/_/zhes bya ba la
[\[25a.3\]]sogs pa gsungs pa gang yin pa rim gyis rang gi lus la dgod pa ni slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin gcig pa yin no/_/de bzhin du de kho na dang 'dra bar rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur byas la/_rigs kyi bdag po gsum gyi sa bon gsum dgod pa ni slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa yin
[\[25a.4\]]no/_/yang na dpa' bo chen po'i yi ge lnga bkod pas shAkya thub pa'i skur byin gyis brlabs te/_slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin no/_/ci zhig 'tshal nas slob dpon 'gyur/_/zhes gang gsungs pa la gleng ste/_a ni gsang sngags thams cad kyi/_/snying po yin par yang
[\[25a.5\]]dag bshad/_/'di las 'byung ba'i gsang sngags ni/_/grangs med rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/spros pa thams cad zhi ba yi/_/ye shes mtha' dag skye bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba dang /_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtsos/_/a ni 'tsho ba yin par gsungs/_/de
[\[25a.6\]]bas 'di kun thams cad de/_/yan lag kun la rnam par gnas/_/yan lag rnams kyang ci rigs par/_/rtag par kun du rig par gyis/_/yi ge rnams kyis thams cad khyab/_/yi ge rnams kyang de yis khyab/_/yi ge rnams las sgra 'byung ba/_/cha dang cha las byung ba'o/_/
[\[25a.7\]]de bas 'di kun thams cad de/_/lus ni sna tshogs las byung ba'o/_/de yi dgongs pa yang dag bstan/_/snying po dag ni nges pas nyon/_/yan lag rnams la yan lag dgod/_/blo ldan rnal 'byor stan 'dug ste/_/bdag lus rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi skur/_/byas nas de
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/dran par byas te 'di kun bya/_/gang gis ye shes rgya chen te/_/cho ga bzhin du shes gyur na/_/de tshe sangs rgyas mthu chen gyis/_/de ni slob dpon yin par bshad/_/de bas de nyid de bzhin gshegs/_/de nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya/_/
[\[25b.2\]]sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/tshangs dang khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa phan yon rgyas par rgyud las rtogs par bya'o/_/slob dpon byang chub kyi sems legs par bsgom pa rang gi lus la yi ge'i 'khor lo dgod pa ni/_don dam
[\[25b.3\]]par 'jug pa'i thabs yin pa nyid kyis 'bras bu'i phan yon che bar bstan pa'i phyir/_gang zhig byang chub sems brtan zhing /_/sgra shes pas ni lhur len gang /_/chos rnams kun la ma chags par/_/rnam pa kun du kun zhes bya/_/yi ge'i 'khor lo thams cad ni/_/gang gi
[\[25b.4\]]lus la rnam gnas pa/_/de ni sngags pa gsang sngags 'chang /_/dpal ldan sngags rgyal rdo rje 'dzin/_/zhes bya ba gsungs so/_/'di ni slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin yi ge'i 'khor lo'i dgod pa'i rim pa rgyas pa yin te/_slob dpon gyi rnal 'byor gyi cho ga 'di ni slob dpon zab
[\[25b.5\]]cing rgya che ba la mos pa byang chub kyi sems brtan pa/_sgra'i don de kho na nyid la mkhas pa kho na'i thun mong ma yin pa nyid yin no/_/da ni slob dpon rnam pa gnyis ka'i yang cho ga mdor bsdus pa dang /_bar ma'i lam gyis so sor slob dpon gyi rnal 'byor gnyis ston te/_slob dpon
[\[25b.6\]]nyid lus rnam par smin pa kho na la rigs kyi bdag po gsum gyi sa bon gyi yi ge gsum bkod pa las sgra'i de kho na nyid la gtod pa'i sgo nas de mdor bsdus pa bstan pa'i phyir/_smin mtshams dbus su yi ge hUM/_/rdo rje can gyi gzhi yin no/_/brang du yi ger zhes bya/_/phyag
[\[25b.7\]]na pad+ma'i gzhi zhes bya/_/a ni snying ga'i gnas bzhag la/_/kun gyi rje de dbang phyug yin/_/rgyu dang rgyu min sna tshogs pa/_/mtha' dag ngas ni rab tu khyab/_/ces bya ba gsungs so/_/de bzhin du gzhan yang slob dpon gyi rnal 'byor bar ma ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dri
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]ba'i tshe nyid na sngon gyi rnam par smin pa'i lus kho na la yi ge lnga pa 'di dag bkod la/_sgra'i de kho na nyid la gtod pa'i sgo nas yongs su gsungs te/_de bstan pa'i phyir/_A zhes bya ba srog gi mchog_/bI zhes bya ba tshig tu bshad/_/ra zhes bya ba me zhes
[\[26a.2\]]brjod/_/hUM zhes bya ba khro bor bshad/_/kha ni nam mkhar shes par bya/_/klad kor stong pa'i mchog ces bya/_/gang zhes slob dpon zhes bya ba/_/'di ni yang dag dam pa yin/_/zhes bya ba gsungs so/_/yi ge lnga po 'di dag ni dpa' bo chen po'i snying po dgod pa'i rim
[\[26a.3\]]par go rims bzhin du chu so dang /_lte ba dang /_brang dang /_smin mtshams dang /_klad par dgod pa shes par bya'o/_/de lta bas na de ltar ting nge 'dzin gang yang rung ba la gnas te/_rig pa'i rgyal po tshig yan lag bcu gnyis 'byung ba bzlas brjod bya'o zhes bshad par
[\[26a.4\]]bya'o/_/de la dkyil 'khor gyis ni phyi dang nang gi bye brag gi rnam pa gnyis so/_/de la phyi'i sa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir/_me tog 'bras bu ldan pa'i ri/_/gtsang zhing yid 'ong chu yi gnas/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_rgyas par rgyud las shes par bya'o/_/
[\[26a.5\]]de ni sbyang ba yang kun rdzob pa kho nar bshad de/_rdo ba dang /_bong ba dang /_gyo mo dang /_gseg ma med cing zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs pa yin no/_/sbyang ba ni sngar sa'i lha la sbran par bshad de/_sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi/_/spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang /_/sa dang
[\[26a.6\]]pha rol phyin pa la/_/lha mo khyed ni dbang du gyur/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no/_/don dam pa'i sa ni slob dpon zab mo spyod pa'i rang gi sems kho na yin la/_de la sbyang ba yang byang chub kyi sems goms pa'i sgo nas yin no/_/de gnyis ka yang bstan pa'i phyir/_/sa ni
[\[26a.7\]]dang por shes par bya/_/sems kyi sar ni bshad pa yin/_/sbyang ba sngar ni bstan pa yin/_/de yis de ni yongs su sbyang /_/zhes bya ba rgyas par/_mngon par byang chub mthong bas na/_/de ltar de ni bstan zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa yin te/_de sbyang ba de ni byang chub
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]kyi sems goms pa'i sbyor ba yin par bshad do/_/de lta bas na dgongs pa ni/_phyi rol gyis sbyang ba med par yang byang chub kyi sems goms pa'i sgo nas sa'i skyon du rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa kho nas yongs su dag par 'gyur ro snyam pa 'di yin no/_/de nyid kyi phyir/
[\[26b.2\]]sngags pa rtog la gnas nas su/_/gang zhig sbyong bar byed pa ni/_/byang chub sems ni rnam spangs pa/_/gsang ba'i bdag po de mi 'dag_/de bas rtog pa rnam spangs nas/_/sa kun rnam par dpyad par bya/_/nga yis dkyil 'khor rnams kyi ni/_/cho ga rgyas par gang bstan
[\[26b.3\]]pa/_/de dag thog mar bstan pa ni/_/rmongs pa rnams kyis mi shes te/_/rtog pa sdug bsngal rgyur 'gyur bar/_/ji srid ma spangs bar du ni/_/'jig rten 'di na sangs rgyas min/_/kun mkhyen zhes kyang mi bya'o/_/zhes bya ba gsungs so/_/rang gi sems kyis yongs su
[\[26b.4\]]sbyang ba'i don 'di nyid rdo rje dam tshig mngon par 'byung ba la sogs pa'i rgyud las rgyas par bstan to/_/de nas zhag gsum nas dkyil 'khor 'dri bar rtsom pas sa yongs su gzung bar bya ste/_de'i mtshan nyid ni/_sa byin gyis brlab pa dang po ni/_rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bya
[\[26b.5\]]bar bshad/_/gnyis pa sems kyi dbang gis te/_/'di ni gzhan du mi bya'o/_/zhes bya ba gsungs so/_/de la sems kyi dbang gis zhes bya ba ni/_slob dpon gyi sems kyi dbang sa phyogs 'dir bdag gis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o snyam pa de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pas so/_/
[\[26b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sa yongs su gzung ba ni rnam pa bcur bshad de/_'di lta ste/_yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshe ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba dang /_ba'i gcin gyis byug pa dang /_gsang sngags kyis mngon par bsngags pas bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang /_byug spos
[\[26b.7\]]kyis lha rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bya ba dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi sar ci rigs par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams nye bar bya ba dang /_dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod pa bya ba dang /_yongs su gzung ba'i bsam pas lag pa sa la bzhag ste/_'phags pa 'jig rten
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang /_mi g.yo ba'i sngags dag las gang yang rung ba zhig brjod pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi lha sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' spyan drang ba dang /_gsang sngags kyi sa'i lha yang dag par mgu bar bya ba dang /_dkyil
[\[27a.2\]]'khor gyis nyid du nyal bar bya ba dang /_rmi lam bzang po brtag pa'o/_/rnam pa bcu po 'di dag ni sa yongs su gzung bar bya ba la bstan pa ste/_de la ji skad du bstan pa'i gnas gang yang rung bar sa gzhi rab tu 'thas par bcags te/_ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba dang /_ba'i
[\[27a.3\]]gcin du bsres pas byug go zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par/_de nas sngags pas rmi lam blta/_/byang chub sems dpa' grags chen nam/_/yang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_/sems can rnams la phan bya'i phyir/_/bdag nyid kun du rtsol 'bad pa'am/_/
[\[27a.4\]]bdag nyid la ni 'di skad du/_/sems dpa' chen po bu khyod legs/_/dkyil 'khor myur du bris shig ces/_/spro ba bskyed pa mthong yang rung /_/zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa yin no/_/de ltar sa yongs su gzung ba byas nas sang lta bu dkyil 'khor 'dri ba dang /_slob
[\[27a.5\]]ma de dag yongs su brtags nas gzung bar bya'o//_//bam po gsum pa/_de la slob ma rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni rnam pa gsum ste/_'di lta ste/_khyad par gyi mtshan nyid dang /_spyi'i mtshan nyid dang /_rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid do/_/de la khyad par gyi mtshan
[\[27a.6\]]nyid bstan pa'i phyir/_slob ma dad cing rigs btsun pa/_/de bzhin dkon mchog gsum la dad/_/zab mo yi ni blo dang ldan/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/de'i phyir mtshan nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan pa mang po mi srid pas/_bcu'am brgyad dam bdun nam lnga/_/
[\[27a.7\]]gcig gnyis bzhi las lhag kyang rung /_/zhes grangs nges pa kun du ston to/_/de nyid kyi phyir/_gang dag gis sngon theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul sgo mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa la goms par byas pa de dag ni rdo rje sems dpa' yin te/_de rnams nyid kyi don
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]gyi phyir/_grangs kyi tshad 'di byas so zhes bya ba gsungs so/_/de la spyi'i mtshan nyid ni yon tan 'di lta bu med pa rnams kyang dkyil 'khor du gzud pa'i phyir yongs su gzung ba gang yin pa ste/_de nyid kyi phyir/_'on kyang slob dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pas/_sems
[\[27b.2\]]can gyi khams ma lus par bsgral bar yi dam bca' ba kho nar bya ste/_des byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyur gyur par bya ba'i phyir/_sems can tshad med pa rnams yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs so/_/slob ma rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas/_dus
[\[27b.3\]]dang dus min bye brag las/_/slob ma rnam bzhir shes bya ste/_/gcig ni de yi mod la bsgrub/_/gnyis su bsgrub dang gnyi gar min/_/mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa yi/_/slob ma de ni rgyal ba'i mchog_/ces bya ba gsungs so/_/de la gcig ni de'i mod la bsgrub ces
[\[27b.4\]]bya ba ni/_slob ma dkyil 'khor mthong ba/_byang chub kyi sems goms pa dang du gyur pa/_slob dpon las phyag rgya dang gsang sngags mnos pa/_rgyud thos pa las gsang sngags spyad pa'i bya ba cho ga shes pa zhi ba la sogs pa'i las dang /_dngos grub mchog la sogs pa'i
[\[27b.5\]]las kyi cho ga la mkhas pa gang yin pa ste/_yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa ni slob dpon gyi thabs su sgrub pa nyid kyi phyir dkyil 'khor du bcug pa'i tshe/_mjug thogs kho nar dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur nas bsgrub cing rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/
[\[27b.6\]]gsang sngags mnos pa ni/_gsang sngags rab tu 'byin pas bzlas brjod byed pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin te/_de lta bas na 'di yang /_de'i mod la bsgrub par bya zhes bya'o/_/gnyis su bsgrub ces bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems ma goms pa dkyil 'khor du bcug nas phyis byang chub
[\[27b.7\]]kyi sems sgom du bcug ste/_phyag rgya dang gsang sngags byin nas/_de yang bzlas brjod byed pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ste/_de lta bas na 'di ni dus gnyis su bsgrub par bya ba yin pas gnyis su bsgrub ces bya'o/_/yang na de nyid rgyud nyan du bcug nas/_bya ba'i las la mkhas
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]par byas la slob dpon du dbang bskur te/_slob dpon gyi thabs su bsgrub pa'i sgo nas bsgrub par bya ste/_de lta bas na 'di yang dus gnyis su bsgrub pa yin te/_dang po dkyil 'khor du bcug pa'i dus ni gcig yin la/_de las gzhan pa ni slob dpon du
[\[28a.2\]]dbang bskur ba'i dus yin pas/_gnyis pa ni dus su bsgrub par brjod pa yin no/_/gang zhig byang chub kyi sems goms pa dang du ma gyur pa de ni dang po dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa na yang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi 'os ma yin la phyis kyang byang chub kyi sems goms par mi nus
[\[28a.3\]]pa'i phyir dang /_de bzhin du rgyud la sogs pa thos par 'dzin mi nus pa'i phyir gnyis kar yang min zhes bya'o/_/mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa yi/_/slob ma de ni rgyal ba'i mchog_/ces bya ba ni gang zhig snying rje chen po'i snying po can dang /_yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_
[\[28a.4\]]gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsum char du dbang bskur ba de ni slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid rnam pa thams cad du rdzogs par gyur pa yin pas/_mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa yi/_/slob dpon de ni rgyal ba'i mchog_/ces bya'o/_/'di ltar slob dpon gyi lam thabs thob pa de lta bu yang
[\[28a.5\]]bsod nams mngon par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dang /_bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang /_sdig pa rnams zad par bya ba'i phyir/_slob dpon gzhan gyis dkyil 'khor legs par bris pa mthong bar byed pas 'di yang slob ma'i grangs su 'gro'o zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya ste/_
[\[28a.6\]]de skad du/_ji lta ji ltar rig sngags tshogs kyis ni/_/bsten pa'i dkyil 'khor bsod nams can mthong ba/_/de lta de ltar rdo rje rigs bsten pa'i/_/lus la 'dir ni byin rlabs kun du 'jug_/rdo rje'i lus ni rgya cher mthong 'gyur nas/_/bgegs rnams mtha' dag 'jig par
[\[28a.7\]]rab tu 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs te/_rgyas par ni lag bzangs kyis zhus pa las 'byung ngo /_/go rims 'di ni dam tshig can rnam pa lnga'i mtshan nyid bstan pa las khong du chud par bya ste/_rgyud 'di nyid las ji skad du/_dkyil 'khor 'di ni mthong ba las/_/dam tshig shes
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]pa gcig ces bya/_/de la phyag rgya mi bstan cing /_/sngags kyang sbyin par mi bya'o/_/byang chub sems kyi bye brag las/_/sngags dang phyag rgya yongs su bzung /_/dkyil 'khor mthong zhes bya ba 'di/_/dam tshig can gnyis shes par bya/_/dkyil 'khor dang ni phyag rgya mthong /_/
[\[28b.2\]]las dang bya ba la yang sbyar/_/bla mas lung ni ma byin par/_/de yang dam tshig shes par bzhed/_/phyag rgya dkyil 'khor bri ba rnams/_/de tshe cho ga bzhin du bstan/_/gsang ba'i ye shes 'byung ba yi/_/dbang bskur med pa'i sngags pa yin/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
[\[28b.3\]]dbus su ni/_/sngags pa tshul bzhin dbang bskur ba/_/dam tshig shes pa sngar shes bya/_/dam tshig can zhes gzhan mi bya/_/zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/'di'i don bshad ma thag pa kho na yin pas rnam par mi bshad do/_/de la slob ma sta gon du gnas pa ni rnam pa dgu ste/_
[\[28b.4\]]'di lta ste/_gsum pa skyabs su btang ba dang /_sdig pa rnams bshags pa dang /_dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug pa dang /_sta gon du gnas par bya ba la/_me tog dang dri la sogs pa sbyin pa dang /_so shing bca' ba'i mtshan ma brtag
[\[28b.5\]]pa dang /_'phags pa mi g.yo ba la sogs pa bzlas brjod byas pa'i skud pas bcings te bsrung ba'i sbyor ba dang /_slob ma sta gon du gnas pa yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i sbyor ba dang /_sta gon du gnas pa rnams gnyid la nyal khar rmi lam bzang ngan gyi khyad par brjod pa dang /_
[\[28b.6\]]de dag kho na la chos bshad pas sems spro ba bskyed pa'o/_/sta gon du gnas pa'i dus na/_dgos pa'i cho ga rnam pa 'di dgu yang /_gsum la skyabs su gtang bar bya'o/_/sdig pa mi bya ba rnams kyang bsgo bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus dang
[\[28b.7\]]ngag dang yid yongs su ma btang bar bslab pa 'dzin par mi byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung 'dis bstan to/_/de la dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa'i cho ga la sbyor ba drug ste/_'di lta ste/_slob dpon dang srad bu 'dzin pa dag dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab par gsungs pa'i lha'i rnal
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]'byor mngon du bya ba dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan bstan pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa'i rab tu dbye ba bstan pa dang /_de'i rim pa rnam par dbye ba dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi gnas dgod pa brjod pa dang /_sgo dang rta babs dang sgo khyud
[\[29a.2\]]rnam par dbye ba'o/_/de la snying rje chen po'i snying po can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi thig 'debs pa'i tshe ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor du bya ba kho nar bstan te/_snying rje chen po'i snying po can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa bstan pa las/_tshon sna lnga
[\[29a.3\]]pa'i srad bu thogs te/_bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la zhes bya ba gang rgyas par gsungs pa yin no/_/yi ge 'khor lo sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa ni chos kyi skur mos pas gdab ste/_'di ltar bdag nyid gzod ma nas zhi ba
[\[29a.4\]]gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs stong pa nyid kyi rang gi ngo bor byin gyis brlabs la zhes gang gsungs pa yin no/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni bdag nyid rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sku sa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bzhi dang ldan
[\[29a.5\]]pas byin gyis brlabs la bri ba dang thig gdab par bya ste/_ji skad du/_dang por sngags pas dkyil 'khor de/_/rang gi lus la dgod bya ste/_/rkang pa nas ni chu so la/_/thug gi bar du sa yi bsam/_/de nas gong du snying ga'i bar/_/sdom brtson can gyis chu yi bsam/_/
[\[29a.6\]]chu yi yan chad me yi ste/_/me yi yan chad rlung yin no/_/bsams nas de ni mkhas pa yis/_/sa la gzugs brnyan gzhag par bya'o/_/zhes gang gsungs pa yin no/_/slob ma rnams gzung ba'i tshe ni/_slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin sngar bshad pa yi ge bkod pa'i
[\[29a.7\]]rnal 'byor gyi sgo nas rgyas pa dang /_bar ma dang mdor bsdus pa kho na bya bar khong du chud par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab ba'i tshe slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par bshad zin to/_/da ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshad kyi cho ga dpyad par bya ste/_de la rgyud 'di las dkyil
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]'khor 'di gsum char yang gdan dang ra ba'i ri mo dang lha'i gzugs dang /_phyag rgya rnams khru dang mtho la sogs pa'i grangs nges pa nyid du ma bstan gyi/_khru la sogs pa'i tshad ma nges par kun du bstan to/_/ji ltar dkyil 'khor chen po gzhan dag las ra ba'i ri mo nges
[\[29b.2\]]par bya ba'i phyir/_dkyil 'khor gyi cha khru bdun dang brgyad la sogs pa nges par snang ba dang /_ji ltar dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa la sogs pa'i rgyud dag las/_lha'i gzugs dang phyag rgya bri bar bya ba rnams/_khru dang mtho la sogs pa rab tu phye ste bstan pa de ltar rnam
[\[29b.3\]]par snang mdzad kyi rgyud 'di las ni/_snying rje chen po'i snying po can la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dag tu rdzogs par byang chub pa rnams kyi ra ba'i ri mo dang /_lha'i gzugs dang /_phyag rgya bri bar bya ba dag gi tshad nges par ma bstan to/_/des na dkyil 'khor 'di gsum ni khru la sogs
[\[29b.4\]]pa'i grangs kyi tshad 'di ma nges so zhes bya bar gnas so/_/de skad du snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa las/_rnam par snang mdzad kyi gdan pad+ma'i mtshan nyid 'di bshad de/_de yi tshad kyang sor bcu drug_/yan chad du ni bshad pa yin/_/zhes gang gsungs pa yin no/_/
[\[29b.5\]]'di'i don ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi gdan pad+ma'i tshad sor bcu drug yan chad sor bcu bdun dang bco brgyad la sogs par bya'i/_sor bcu drug gi 'og ma grangs bcu bzhi dang bco lnga la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du bya ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di yin no/_/de ltar na dkyil 'khor gsum
[\[29b.6\]]char la yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi gdan pad+ma 'ba' zhig sor bcu drug las mi chung bar bya'i/_dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i bye brag lhag ma rnams kyi gdan pad+ma ni ma nges pa kho nar bshad par blta bar bya'o/_/de ltar na dkyil 'khor gsum char la yang spyir lha'i gzugs dang /_gdan dang
[\[29b.7\]]phyag rgya rnams kyi tshad nges pa med pa kho nar gzhung 'dis bstan te/_yid kyi rgya ni ji tsam pa/_/stan dang phyag rgya dag dang ni/_/lha yi tshad kyang go rims bzhin/_/de tsam du ni shes par bya/_/zhes gang gsungs pa yin no/_/tshul 'dis ni yid kyi rgya ji lta bar rnam par snang mdzad kyi
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]gdan pad+ma'i sor dag ji lta ji ltar bskyed pa de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi ra ba la lha'i gzugs dang /_phyag rgya tshad ma nges pa rnams kyang rnam par snang mdzad kyi gdan pad+ma'i rjes su mthun par mngon par bskyed par bya'o zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya'o/_/snying rje

[\[30a.4\]]der ni dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/_/srad bu dag ni gnyis pa yis/_/sa la dkyil 'khor dgod par bya/_/zhes gang gsungs pa yin no/_/de la/_bar snang la ni bzung nas su/_/zhes bya ba ni snying rje chen po can la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du tshon sna lnga'i srad bu bskor nas bar snang

[\[30a.6\]]de ni dkyil 'khor gzhan du spyad zin pa nyid kyis dman ma dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no/_/gsher thig ni mtshan nyid ma bstan kyang /_kha dog 'chol pa yongs su spang ba'i phyir/_dkar po kho nar bya'o zhes khong du chud par bya'o/_/de la 'di snying rje chen po'i snying po can la
[\[30a.7\]]sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa'i cho ga bshad pa yin te/_'di la yang thig ni rnam pa gnyis so/_/gcig ni bar snang gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dbye ba'i thig yin te/_gang gi dbang du mdzad nas/_shar phyogs srad bu bre ba ni/_/lte ba'i thad kar bzung nas su/_/bar
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]snang la ni gzung bar bya'o/_/de nas lho phyogs song nas su/_/byang phyogs su ni bri bar bya/_/zhes gsungs pa yin no/_/'di'i don ni dkyil 'khor gyi thig gi thog ma gnyis slob dpon rang gi lte ba'i thad kar dang thig 'dzin par byed pa'i lte ba'i thad kar bzung nas myur du bcom ldan

[\[30b.5\]]bya/_/de nas g.yas su bsgyur bar bya/_/bsgyur te de ru 'dug nas ni/_/lho yi phyogs su bri bar bya/_/de nas gnas de btang nas su/_/me yi phyogs su gnas nas ni/_/sngags par gsang sngags cho gar gnas/_/shar du srad bu bre bar bya/_/de nas de bzhin dbang ldan phyogs/_/

[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]nas ri mo brgyad brgyad kyis yongs su bcad la re'u mig brgyad cu rtsa gcig tu bya'o/_/re'u mig de dag kyang cha gsum byas nas cha re re la re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bdun du 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa re re la re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bdun dag tu

[\[31a.3\]]gyur to/_/sngar ni rim pa gsum re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bdun dag tu shes par bya'o zhes bshad de/_de'i phyir re'u lnga po 'di dag gis sa'i cha dang nang rol gyi rim pa dag tu 'brel par mngon te/_'di ltar re'u lnga po 'di dag med par nang rol gyi rim pa dag re'u nyi shu rtsa bdun

[\[31a.5\]]nas re'u bzhi po 'di dag cha sum cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir rim pa dang po'i ri 'u bsgrengs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dag las cha re re zhig kun nas drangs te/_nang rol gyi rim pa gnyis kyi re'u'i sa dag tu bsnan par bya'o/_/de ltar na rim pa dang po'i re'u bsgrengs pa dag las re'u
[\[31a.6\]]bzhi kun tu drangs par 'gyur ro/_/re'u lnga pa gang yin pa de yang cha bzhir byas la/_cha re re la yang brgyad brgyad du byas na/_sum cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir 'dir yang snga ma bzhin du rim pa dang po'i re'u bsgrengs pa phyogs bzhin gnas pa dag la cha re re zhig kun nas
[\[31a.7\]]drangs te/_nang rol gyi rim pa gnyis kyi re'u'i sa dag tu kun nas bsnan par bya'o/_/de ltar na re'u lnga po 'di yang rim pa dang po'i re'u bsgrengs pa dag las kun nas drangs te/_nang rol gyi rim pa gnyis kyi re'u mig dag tu kun nas bsnan par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na rim pa dang
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]po'i re'u mig gis nyi shu rtsa bdun dag tu byas par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rim pa dang po'i las drangs pa'i re'u lnga po nang rol gyi rim pa gnyis kyi re'u sa dag tu bsnan pa dag gis rim pa gnyis po de re'u sa nyi shu rtsa bdun dag tu mnyam par 'gyur mod kyi/_'on kyang re'u bgo ba snga ma dang
[\[31b.2\]]sbyar na nang rol gyi rim pa gnyis po 'di byar mi rung ste/_de lta bas na nang rol gyi rim pa gnyis rnam par dbye ba'i phyir/_rim pa dang po'i re'u'i sa kun nas drangs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad nang rol gyi rim pa gnyis kyi re'u mig dang bcas te cig car phyis nas nang gi cha dang
[\[31b.3\]]gcig tu byas la yang ri mo drug pa dag gis kun nas yongs su bcad de/_re'u bzhi bcu rtsa dgu par thig gdab par bya'o/_/de'i phyir rim pa dang po dang nye ba'i phyogs bzhir yang re'u bsgrengs pa dag gis re'u nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'gyur te/_de dag gis rim pa gnyis pa brtag par
[\[31b.4\]]bya'o/_/de'i nang rol na lhag ma nyi shu rtsa lnga zhig lus gang dag yin pa de dag gi nang nas re'u nyi shu rtsa bzhi nang rol gyi rim pa gsum pa bya'o/_/'dir yang re'u nyi shu rtsa lnga pa gang yin pa de'i phyed rim pa dbu ma kho nar bzhag la/_ched gzhan gang yin pa de cha bcu drug tu bya ste/_
[\[31b.5\]]de'i cha re re'i tshad du ni rim pa dbu ma dang 'brel pa'i re'u bcu drug ngos bzhin gnas pa las cha re re zhig kun nas drangs te rim pa gnyis pa'i re'u mig gi sa phyogs bzhin gnas pa dag tu yang bsnan par bya'o/_/de ltar na rim pa gnyis pa dang gsum pa ni so sor re'u sa nyi shu rtsa
[\[31b.6\]]phyed dang lnga dag tu byas par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na de ltar rim pa gsum char yang chu dang zhing gi tshad dag gis so so'i re'u'i sa nyi shu rtsa bdun dag tu kun nas cha mnyam par thig gdab par 'gyur zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya'o/_/de'i rjes la phyogs bzhi char du yang rim pa re re zhing

[\[32a.1\]]rje chen po'i snying po can la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa gsum char yang so sor chu dang zheng gi tshad dag gis mnyam par brtag par bshad pa yin no/_/gsang ba'i rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ma bshad pa thams cad bsdus par gyur pa las
