[\[286a.3\]]tshad stong phrag brgyad bcur gyen du mtho zhing 'phags te/_de bzhin du sems de yang bdag gi yon tan gyis kun nas 'phags so snyam nas 'gying zhing che bar byed pa'i chos bsten par byed do/_/rgya mtsho lta bu'i sems gang zhe na/_gang rang gi lus nyid la mchog tu 'dzin cing 'dug

[\[286a.5\]]nyid kyis 'gyur bar bsten pa'o zhes pa ni phug lta bu'i sems te/_phug ni sgo na chung ngur nges pa las phug gi nang ni sgo las rnam pa du mar che bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sems de yang sngar bdag nyid tshul khrims dang /_yon tan dang ldan pa nges par gnas pa las tshul khrims dang
[\[286a.6\]]yon tan de nyid kyis dregs nas de'i gzhis nga rgyal byed cing 'gyur ba'o/_/de la skye ba gyur pa'i sems gang zhe na/_gang gi sems gang kho na dang skyes pa de kho na dang lhan cig 'gro ba'o zhes pa ni skye bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyi sems te/_sngon dge ba dang mi dge ba gang yang rung ba la
[\[286a.7\]]spyad pa'i bag chags yod pas gang du skyes na yang bag chags de nyid dang lhan cig tu skye'o/_/yang na sngon gyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las gang yang rung ba'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi 'dra ba'i skye ba rnyed nas de lta bu dang lhan cig tu skye ba ste/_dper na tshe rabs snga ma la srog
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]gcod pa goms shing mang du byas pas tshe phyi ma la nad mang zhing tshe thung bar 'gyur ba ste de bzhin du dge ba la yang ji ltar rigs par sbyar bar bya'o/_/'jig rten pa'i sems brgya drug cu bskal pa gsum gyis 'das nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems skye ste zhes pa la/_'jig rten

[\[286b.6\]]kyi phyir ro/_/nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa/_/zhes pa ni de ltar zab cing zhi ba'i gang zag la bdag med par rtogs de nyon mongs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'o zhes pa'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po/_de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems la gnas pa rnams la yang phung po la
[\[286b.7\]]yod do snyam pa'i blo nye bar skye'o zhes pa ni de ltar gang zag la bdag med pa rnam pa dang bcas pa zab cing zhi ba 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems la gnas pa na gong du smos pa'i tshul gyis phung po tsam zhig yod par rtog gi/_gang zag la ni bdag med par rtogs te de ni bskal pa
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]gsum gyis rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/phung po dag la 'dod chags dang bral ba bskyed pa zhes pa nas rnal 'byor pa dag bskal pa gcig gis 'da' bar byed do zhes pa'i bar ni de ltar phung po la spyir brtags te/_brtags pa na de la dngos po yod do snyam du blo skyes pa de
[\[287a.2\]]phung po so sor phye ste sun phyung ba na gzugs kyi phung po ni dbu ba rdos pa 'dra ste ji ltar dbu ba la so sor gzhigs na dbu ba la snying po med pa bzhin du phung po de yang bshig ste so sor brtags na kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa chos so so ba rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid tsam du zad kyi phung po

[\[287a.5\]]pa'o/_/dngos po yod pa ma yin gyi de ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin tsam du zad do/_/'du shes kyi phung po yang so sor gzhigs na smig rgyu dang 'dra ste ji ltar skom pas gdungs pa'i skyes bus smig rgyu la chur mthong mod kyi/_de la chu'i dngos po yod pa ma yin te/_smig rgyu'i rang
[\[287a.6\]]bzhin tsam du zad do/_/'du shes kyi phung po yang de dang 'dra ste/_'du shes kyi phung por brtags pa'i dngos po yod pa ma yin pa ma yin gyi/_de ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin tsam du zad do/_/de bzhin du 'du byed kyi phung po yang chu shing gi snying po dang 'dra ste/_kun du grags pas
[\[287a.7\]]'dir ma smos so/_/de ltar phung po de yang dbu bal sogs pa'i dpes sun phyung nas phung por brtags pa'i dngos po yod par mi 'gyur te so so'i mtshan nyid du zad do/_/de ltar phung por yod par ma grub na khams dang skye mched rnams kyang dngos po las gzhan ma yin pas khams dang
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]skye mched du brtags pa'i dngos po yod po ma yin gyi de rnams chos so so ba'i rang bzhin tsam du zad do/_/gzung ba dang 'dzin pa yang ste/_gzugs kyi phung po ni gzung ba'i dngos por brtags/_tshor ba la sogs pa phung po bzhi ni 'dzin par brtags pa'i dngos po yod pa ma yin te/_chos

[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]kyi tshul 'di yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o zhes pa ni/_ji ltar sgra'i rkyen gyis brag ca 'byung bas dngos po yod pa ma yin yang sgrar 'byung ba de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi sgra yang sngags kyi rang bzhin gyis stong mod kyi/_sgrub pa'i rkyen gyis sgra de 'byung ba ni dper
[\[297a.2\]]na brag ca dang 'dra bar bstan pa'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang /_zla ba shar na chu'i nang du gzugs brnyan mthong nas chu zla zhes brjod pa de bzhin du/_sngags pa de nyid kyang chu zla bzhin du rig sngags 'chang zhes brjod do zhes pa ni/_zla ba shar ba'i gzugs brnyan chu'i nang du 'byung

[\[297b.1\]]ba'i dpe'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po/_'di ni theg pa chen po'i gzhi/_/zhes pa nas/_ye shes sna tshogs cher 'byung ba/_/nor gyi dbyig 'di shes na ni/_/kun gyi sems kyi bye brag kyang /_/ji bzhin yang dag rab tu shes/_/zhes pa'i bar du sa dang po'i byang chub kyi sems mnyam pa nyid rtogs/_

[\[298a.1\]]cad rab tu shes par gyur pa bstan pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las sems kyi khyad par rim par phye ba dang po'o//_//da ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams

[\[298a.5\]]'das la phyag na rdo rjes gsol ba 'chad de/_gsol ba de yang de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa nas/bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po

[\[299a.1\]]su sbyangs pas mngon par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa rdzogs nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnyed par gyur pa ni dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can mang po dag gi don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gsang sngags

[\[299b.1\]]bcu drug bshad pa dang /_de bzhin du rim gyis grub pa'i sgo nas lha mnyes par bya ba'i spyod pa bzlas pa yan lag bzhi dang rang gi sems yongs su sbyang bar byas pas lha mnyes par 'gyur te/_rig 'dzin la sogs pa'i grub pa mngon du thob nas rim gyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su

[\[299b.7\]]dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/_de'i dgos pa ni sku la sogs pa mi zad pa'i rgyan gyis sems can gyi khams thams cad kun du khyab par bstan nas sems can de rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsgral ba la bya ste/_sems can de rnams
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]kyang da dung ma lus par ma bsgral bas dgos pa ma rdzogs zhes bya'o/_/sems can gyi khams ma lus pa bsgral bar dam bca' pa mdzad pas zhes pa ni/_de ltar chos kyi dgos pa de ma rdzogs pa yang rdzogs shing zad pa ma yin gyi bcom ldan 'das sngon

[\[300b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa de'i tshe ba spu'i bu ga re re nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'dra ba rnam par sprul pa byung ste sems can gyi don byed pa ni sa dang po nas brtsams nas sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de dag slar bcom ldan 'das kyi sku

[\[300b.4\]]sogs pa'o/_/'bras bu ni slob ma 'jug cing dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'o/_/de la dkyil 'khor bri ba'i rgyu'i gtso bo ni slob dpon yin te/_de bas na slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid thog mar bshad do/_/slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bshad pa yang slob dpon du 'jug pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan

[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]snying rje can zhes pa snying rje ni sems can sdug bsngal las 'don par 'dod pa ste/_de yang rang bzhin gyi snying rje can dang mngon par 'dus byas pa'i snying rje ste de dag dang ldan pa'o/_/sgyu rtsal dag la mkhas pa zhes pa ni spyir 'jig rten gyi dgra thabs la sogs pa rnam pa

[\[301a.3\]]tshul chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma byung ma skyes pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du bsgom pa la mkhas pa'o/_/kun rdzob tu ni de ltar stong pa nyid bsgom pa las langs nas sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams spyad nas de la yang mi chags par 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul
[\[301a.4\]]du sbyor ba la mkhas pa'o/_/theg pa gsum gyi khyad par shes pa zhes pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa gang zag la bdag med par rtogs nas phung po dang khams la sogs pa la mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang bdag med par rtogs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa phung po la sogs pa de

[\[301a.7\]]yi ge sa bon dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams la mkhas pa ste/_sngags la mkhas pa ni sngags kyi tshig rnams bskul ba dang phyag rgya'i rang bzhin 'byed mkhas pa'o/_/yi ge sa bon la mkhas pa ni lha rnams so so'i sa bon snying po gang yin pa dang /_de rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]sgo dang /_las gang yin pa la mkhas pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa ni ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa las dbang chen dang chu la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bkod cing de rnams kyi las sgrub pa la mkhas pa'o/_/bsam pa shes pa ni slob ma rnams kyi bsam pa shes pa ste de yang gzhan
[\[301b.2\]]gyi sems shes pa'i tshul gyis shes pa la ni mi bya'i/_/sngags kyi cha brtag pa'i tshul gyis slob ma rnams kyi spyod pa dang tshul la brtags nas lha zhi ba dang khro bo rnams gang bsnyen par 'os pa dang /_grub pa rab 'bring gsum las gang bsgrub par 'os pa la sogs pa'i tshul la
[\[301b.3\]]mkhas pa'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rnams la dad pa zhes pa ni de rnams kyi yon tan bshad pa la yid ches pa'o/_/dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las byed par gnang zhing dbang bskur ba zhes pa la dbang bskur ba ni dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor du dri dang me tog dang sman dang

[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]pa'o/_/rgyal ba'i sras zhes pa ni rgyal ba'i bdag nyid las skyes pa ste rgyal ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin la/_de'i bdag nyid ni chos kyi dbyings te/_chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid la mos pa las byung ba ni rgyal ba'i bdag nyid las skyes pa zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas

[\[302b.1\]]mthong ba'o/_/de lta bu'i slob ma mthong na phas ma gsol kyang slob ma de snod du 'gyur ba yin pas 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pas chos bshad cing sngags kyi tshul la gzhag par bya'o/_/mos mang zhes pa ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi

[\[303a.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ste de bas na/_de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi/_/cho ga mchog bzang 'di mkhyen nas/_/dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du/_/thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes/_/gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam

[\[304a.1\]]gnas ni lha rnams la rab tu shis so zhes pa'i bar du'o/_/de la tshes grangs dang zhes pa nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshes ltas bzang pos mtshon pa la zhes pa'i bar du ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sa brtag pa tshar nas/_yongs su gzung ba rtsom pa'i tshes grangs dang skar ma

[\[305b.1\]]nas phyis dkyil 'khor bri ba las zhag gsum gyi sngon rol du ji skad du smos pa'i sa der ji ltar rigs par brtags nas sa yongs su gzung ba'i rim pa 'di ltar bya'o/_/thog mar ba'i lci bas la ma lhung ba dang ba'i gcin du bsres pas dkyil 'khor bya'o/_/de nas sa de sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o/_/

[\[305b.4\]]gsum rnam par rgyal ba'am/_gang yang rung ba'i sngags kyis sa de yongs su gzung bar bya'o/_/des na sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa slob ma rnams dkyil 'khor du gzud pa'i nub mo gshegs su gsol lo/_/de nas sngags pa de nub phyogs kyi ngos su nyal la byang chub kyi sems dang snying rje dang ldan

[\[310a.4\]]sras bcas pa/_/bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni/_/bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun/_/yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa/_/de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la/_/sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur/_/zhes pa ste/_de ltar khyed kyis sdig pa bshags shing skyabs su 'gro ba dang sdom pa
[\[310a.5\]]bzung bas mnyam pa med pa'i rnyed pa bla na med pa'i byang chub de yang rnyed do zhes pa ste de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal ba sras dang bcas pas bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams yongs su bzung ba'i phyir ro/_/de bas na khyed rnams de ring ni theg pa chen po la skye bzhin pa yin la sang ni theg pa chen po la skye
[\[310a.6\]]bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o/_/de la rnyed pa mnyam med ces pa pa ni sngags kyi tshul la spyod pa dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa dang theg pa chen po pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa dang yang mi mnyam pa yin nam zhe na/_pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa la spyod par 'dra yang 'dir sngags kyi
[\[310a.7\]]bzlas pa la sogs pa la khyad par du lhag par spyod pas rnyed pa mnyam par med pa ste rnyed ces pa de lta bu thob ces pa'o/_/bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/_/zhes pa ni slob ma rnams la bstod pa'i tshig ste/_de lta bu'i mthu chen po zhugs pas btsun pa zhes pa'i don to/_/rgyal
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]ba sras bcas pa zhes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i sras dang bcas pa ste/_gang phyir rgyal ba kun gyis khyed rnams zhes sbrel lo/_/bstan pa 'di la kun yongs su gzung zhes kyang sbyar te/_rgyal ba sras dang bcas pas sngags spyad pa'i bstan pa 'dir
[\[310b.2\]]yongs su bzung bas na khyed rnams kyis mnyam pa med pa'i rnyed pa thob po zhes par 'brel lo/_/skye bzhin pa ni theg pa chen po skye bzhin pa ste/_de bas na/_de phyir de rnams theg chen la/_/sangs ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur/_/zhes pa ste sang lta bu dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshe theg pa chen po'i
[\[310b.3\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed pa skyes zin zhes pa'i don to/_/gal te rmi lam dag tu/_/gtsug lag khang dang kun dga' bzang /_/zhes pa nas/_/brtul zhugs bzang po khyed rnams kyis/_/nang par thams cad la zlos/_/slob ma de dag rnams la ni/_/de skad bsgo nas chos kyang bshad/_
[\[310b.4\]]ces pa'i bar dag gis ni de ltar spro ba bskyed pa la sogs pa byas nas slob ma rnams la rmi lam gyi ltas 'di rnams bstan te 'di rnams las gang mthong ba de slob dpon la zlos su gzhug pa ste/_rmi lam gyi ltas de rnams kyang sa las byung ba dang bar snang gi dang 'phags pa'i dang rnam pa gsum
[\[310b.5\]]ste rab dang 'bring dang tha mar blta'o/_/gsum po de re re la yang /_rab dang 'bring dang tha ma ste gsum du dbye bar bya'o/_/de la gtsug lag khang zhes pa nas bram ze dang zhes pa'i bar ni sa las byung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas dang ni rang sangs rgyas/_/de bzhin rgyal ba'i nyan thos dang /_byang
[\[310b.6\]]chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/_/zhes pa ni 'phags pa'i'o/_/gal te 'bras bu thob pa dang /_/zhes pa nas/_bkra shis yid du 'ong ba'i tshig_/'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar grags/_/zhes pa'i bar ni snang las byung ba'i ltas so/_/de la gtsug lag khang nas yang thog
[\[310b.7\]]ces pa'i bar du tha ma'o/_/ral gri dang yid bzhin nor bu ni sa las byung ba'i rab po/_/gdugs dang me tog sna tshogs dang /_/bud med bzang mo gos dkar can/_/sdug pa'i gnyen dang bshes dag dang /_/glegs bam de bzhin bram ze dang /_/zhes pa ni sa las byung ba'i ltas 'bring ngo /_/
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]sangs rgyas ni 'phags pa'i ltas rab po/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che dang /_rang sangs rgyas ni 'phags pa'i 'bring ngo /_/nyan thos ni 'phags pa'i tha ma'o/_/'bras bu thob pa ni bar snang gi tha ma'o/_/mtsho dang rgya mtsho la brkyal zhing brgal ba ni bar snang gi
[\[311a.2\]]'bring ngo /_/de bzhin du bkra shis yid du 'ong ba'i tshig 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba gang las thos na bar snang gi rmi lam gyi ltas rab tu shes par bya ste/_rmi lam de rnams blta ba yang khyad par gyi slob ma rnams gang du dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sa de'i nye 'khor du nyal bar rigs so/_/theg pa chen po
[\[311a.3\]]cher 'byung ba'i/_/lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/_/zhes pa nas/_theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di ni/_/tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur/_/zhes pa'i bar gyis ni slob ma de rnams spro ba bya ba'i phyir theg pa chen po la skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa'i theg pa chen po nyid rgyu dang 'bras
[\[311a.4\]]bu'i yon tan gyi yang 'dir bshad de/_de lta bu'i theg pa khyed kyis thob pa yin no zhes pa bstan to/_/lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/_/zhes pa ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'gro ba'i lam ste de yang sngags kyi tshul la spyod pa'i lam mo/_/lam mchog ces pa ni nyan thos dang
[\[311a.5\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam las 'phags pa'i phyir ro/_/pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam las ci'i phyir 'phags she na/_pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa la spyod par 'dra yang lha rnams
[\[311a.6\](]mnyas [,]mnyes [)]par bya ba'i phyir yan lag bzhi la sogs pa'i sngags bzlas pa dang mchod pa dang sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i sgo nas sbyin pa la sogs pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rgyun mi 'chad par spyod pas 'bras bu myur du thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir mchog go/_/dpal dang ldan zhes pa ni mngon par mtho
[\[311a.7\]]ba'i mtshan nyid lha dang mi'i longs spyod kyi bde ba dang rig 'dzin la sogs pa'i grub pa thob pa dang /_nges par legs pa'i mtshan nyid mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa rim gyis thob par 'gyur bas na dpal dang ldan pa'o/_/theg pa chen po cher 'gyur ba'i/_/zhes pa ni
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyi theg pa chen po ni bla na med pa'i byang chub 'byung ba'i rgyu'i gtso bo yin pas na cher 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/gang gi phyir/_khyed rnams der ni dong bas na/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur bar 'os so zhes pa ste/_de ltar theg pa chen po la zhugs na de yi 'bras bu
[\[311b.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin chos kyi sku thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje 'dzin pa spros pa med par gnas pas 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa nas de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su ma
[\[311b.3\]]btang bar bslab pa 'dzin par mi byed do zhes pa'i bar gyis ni sngar dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa gsungs pa de nyid zhib tu bshad pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das dus gsum du sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa gang la byang chub sems dpa' rnams gnas na sangs
[\[311b.4\]]rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyes par 'gyur bar bshad du gsol zhes pa ni/_dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa de la gnas na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyes te/_mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs par thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu
[\[311b.5\]]bshad du gsol zhes pa'o/_/dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa ni bshad zin to/_/lus dang ngag dang yid gcig tu 'jug cing zhes pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid gsum dus gcig tu stong pa nyid la 'jug pa ste/_de ltar lus dang ngag dang yid gsum stong pa nyid kyi rang
[\[311b.6\]]bzhin du gyur cing dmigs su med pas chags par bya dang chags pa nyid dang chags par byed pa la sogs pa yang dmigs su med de/_de ltar dmigs su med pa na lus dang ngag dang yid rnams sdig pa la sogs pa mi byed pa de ni sdom pa'o/_/chos thams cad la rtsom pa med ces
[\[311b.7\]]pa ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i chos thams cad skye bar byed pa'i rgyu lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyis mi byed pa ste/_de ltar de dag skyed pa'i rgyu ma byas pas na sdom pa yin te/_de dag gis ni don dam pa'i sdom pa bstan pa'o/_/de yang gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdag gis lus yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa'o zhes pa ni dus gsum sgrib pa med pa'i sdom pa de gzhan ma yin gyi bdag gi lus sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phul ba lus de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
[\[312a.2\]]rnams dbang ba yin gyi bdag la dbang med do/_/de ltar bdag la dbang med de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbang na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ni mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi spyod do/_/de bas na gang gis lus phul ba des kyang chos bzhin du bya dgos
[\[312a.3\]]te/_lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu mi spyod pas na sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/de bas na de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang gis bdag gi lus yongs su gtang ba des ni dngos po gsum yongs su btang ba yin te/_dngos po gsum yongs su gtang ba de yang gang zhe na 'di lta
[\[312a.4\]]ste lus dang ngag dang yid do/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sdom pas bsdam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su ma btang bar bslab pa 'dzin pa
[\[312a.5\]]mi byed do zhes pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lus phul bas lus dang ngag dang yid gsum char phul bar 'gyur te/_lus dang ngag dang yid gsum la bdag mi dbang na lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sgo nas mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu mi spyod pas de nyid
[\[312a.6\]]sdom pa ste/_lus dang ngag dang yid gsum lhas lhag pa'i sdom pa gzhan yod pa ma yin no zhes pa'i don to/_/mdor na gang gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdag gi lus phul ba des lus dang ngag dang yid gsum char phul bas na gsum po de dag
[\[312a.7\]]gi sgo nas mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi spyod pa de dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrib pa med pa thob par byed pa'i rgyur 'gyur bar bstan pa yin no/_/de nas phyis de nyin par bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag byas te bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]brlabs la zhes pa nas/_de nas sems sbyang ba'i phyir spos chu gtsang ma blud do zhes pa'i bar gyis nang par dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i slob dpon gyi las su bya ba rnams bshad pa ste/_nang par nyi ma 'char kar brtags na lho byang dang shar nub la sogs pa gsal bar mngon te/_de bas
[\[312b.2\]]na nang par khrus la sogs pa byas nas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sa de'i dbus su zhugs te bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad yid la byas nas phyag byas la dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya bcings te chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas bdag nyid stong par byin gyis brlabs la/_chos kyi 'khor lo'i
[\[312b.3\]]phyag rgya bcings nas rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab po/_/de nas rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya bcings nas go cha bgo ba de ni rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa ste rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sems shin tu brtan pa rdo rje dang 'dra ba la bya ste/_de yang gang zhe na phyin ci ma log par yongs su grub
[\[312b.4\]]pa'i mtshan nyid byang chub kyi snying po'i sems te/_de nyid dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i byang chub sems dpa'i skur byin gyis brlab pa'o/_/de ltar slob dpon de rdo rje sems pa'i skur byin gyis brlabs la dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i lho byang dang shar nub la sogs pa brtags te gtan la dbab pa dang
[\[312b.5\]]lha rnams gang du 'god pa'i gnas kyang yid kyis gtan la dbab par bya'o/_/yang bum pa spos chus bkang ba la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas mngon par bsngags te sgo dang por gzhag la mkhas pas skye bo kun la des bsang gtor bya'o zhes pa ni gzhung las 'byung ba'i mtshan
[\[312b.6\]]nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa spos chus bkang ba la rin po che dang sman dang /_'bru lnga rnams blugs te dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i sgor bzhag ste slob ma rnams nang du 'ong ba'i tshe bgegs bsal ba'i phyir gtor ro/_/khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags kyis bum pa de la gdab pa de yang
[\[312b.7\]]snying po'i sngags kyis gdab na brgya rtsa brgyad du gdab la/_rtsa ba'i sngags kyis gdab na bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab bo/_/de nas sems sbyang ba'i phyir spos chu gtsang ma blud pa ni slob ma rnams kyi sngags spyod pa dang 'gal ba'i kha zas zos pa'i rnam par rtog pa med na yang spos kyi
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]chu gtsang ma de blud do/_/gtsang ma zhes pa ni srog chags kyi yan lag la sogs pa med pa'o/_/sngags dang 'gal ba'i kha zas zos pa'i rnam par rtog pa med na yang spos kyi chu gtsang ma 'thungs pas bdag gi rgyud gtsang mar gyur to snyam pa'i 'du shes skye ste mi gtsang ba la
[\[313a.2\]]sogs pa'i dogs pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir spos chu blud do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa nas/_rtag tu mtshan mo bri bar bya/_/zhes pa'i bar gyis dus ji tsam na dkyil 'khor dri ba zhus shing bshad pa yin te/_dus dang tshod ces pa ni dkyil
[\[313a.3\]]'khor 'dri ba'i dus nam nyid kyi tshe na yin pa de bshad du gsol zhes pa'o/_/kun mkhyen pa ni bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'o/_/smra ba'i mchog gis bka' stsol cig_/ces pa ni smra ba thams cad kyi mchog ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni slob
[\[313a.4\]]dpon dag_/gsang sngags sgrub la 'bad pa na/_/gang gi dus su dkyil 'khor du/_/sems dpa' chen por byin rlob pa'i/_/zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'dri ba dang /_sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dri ba na byang chub sems dpa' rnams der gshegs nas byin
[\[313a.5\]]gyis rlob par 'gyur ba'i dus gang lags zhes zhus pa ste/_sems dpa' chen po zhes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mi bya'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni dus thams cad du byin gyis
[\[313a.6\]]rlob pas zhu mi dgos la/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas sems can thams cad kyi don la rtog pa sngon du btang ste gshegs pas dus thams cad du byin gyis mi rlob po/_/de bas na dkyil 'khor 'dri ba la byang chub sems dpa' rnams gshegs par 'gyur
[\[313a.7\]]ba'i dus gang yin zhes zhus pa'o/_/gnyis su na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sems dpa' chen po zhes nam yang mi brjod de/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems dpa' chen po zhes brjod par grags so/_/de bas na sems dpa' chen po zhes pa ni byang chub sems
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]dpa' chen po rnams la bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor don du gnyer ba la/_/rtag tu mtshan mo bri bar bya/_/zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor 'dri bar 'dod pa rnams kyis dus thams cad du dkyil 'khor thams cad mtshan mo bri'o zhes bka' stsal pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyang mtshan
[\[313b.2\]]mo'i dus der gshegs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no/_/de bas na 'dis ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyi ga yang dus thams cad du mtshan mo bri bar shes par bya'o/_/de la gsang ba'i rgyud la sogs par sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ma gtogs par gzhan
[\[313b.3\]]thams cad mtshan mo bri'o zhes 'byung ste de bas na sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni nyin par bri bar gsungs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sgrub pa ni nam srod nas nam langs kyi bar tshan rangs par bsgrub dgos te/_de bas na sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor mtshan mo bri ba'i skabs med de nyin par
[\[313b.4\]]bri bar gsungs so/_/'dir ni gnyi ga yang mtshan mo bri bar gsungs pas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ni de nyid kyi mtshan mo bri bar bya la/_sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rgyud 'di las mtshan mo bri bar gsungs pas gsang ba'i rgyud las 'byung ba ltar nyin par bri ra med la/_sgrub pa nyid kyi
[\[313b.5\]]mtshan mo yang bri ba'i skabs med de nub de nyid la bris na mtshan mo'i mel tshe thun 'ga' dkyil 'khor bri ba la zad pas sgrub pa mtshan rangs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bas na snga de nub mo dkyil 'khor bris la phyi de nub mo bsgrub par shes par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor chen po dag nub gcig
[\[313b.6\]]gis mi rdzogs pa yang gzhung de ltar shes par bya'o/_/da ni dkyil 'khor ba'i don du srad bu bre ba la sogs pa bshad par bya ste/_dkyil 'khor bri ba de yang don rnam pa drug gis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/drug gang zhe na/_dkyil 'khor gyi srad bu bre ba'i ting nge 'dzin bshad
[\[313b.7\]]pa dang /_srad bu bre ba bshad pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi tshad bshad pa dang /_snam bu'i rim pa dbye ba dang /_sgo khyud dang rta babs rnams rnam par dbye ba dang /_lha rnams kyi gnas kyi nges pa bshad pa'o/_/de la slob dpon gyis sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas la tshon
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]sna lnga'i srad bu thogs te bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la zhes pa ni srang bu bre ba'i ting nge 'dzin bshad pa ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas la zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par byed pa na thog mar sangs rgyas rjes su
[\[314a.2\]]dran zhing phyag bya bar rigs so/_/tshon sna lnga'i srad bu zhes pa ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du bsam pa ste bdag rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku ye shes lnga po de dag dang ldan par byin gyis brlab po/_bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor
[\[314a.3\]]rnam pa gsum la ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa yang bye brag rnam pa gsum ste/_snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor la slob dpon rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur byin gyis brlabs nas srad bu bre ba la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi las rnams bya'o/_/yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor la chos kyi
[\[314a.4\]]skur byin gyis brlabs nas dkyil 'khor gyi las rnams bya'o/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la dbang chen la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga dang ldan pa'i skur byin gyis brlabs nas dkyil 'khor gyi las rnams bya ste/_de dag kyang zhib tu ni bsdus pa'i don las bshad cing rgyud nyid las kyang so
[\[314a.5\]]so'i skabs su 'chad do/_/tshon sna lnga'i skud pa rnams ye shes lngar bsam pa ni 'og nas rdul tshon sna lnga la sangs rgyas lngar bsam pa dang sbyar ro/_/shar du srad bu bre ba ni/_/lte ba'i thad kar bzung nas su/_/bar snang la ni gzung bar bya/_/de nas lho phyogs song nas su/_/byang phyogs
[\[314a.6\]]su ni bre bar bya/_/zhes pa ni thog mar slob dpon de dkyil 'khor gyi nub phyogs su gnas nas kha shar phyogs su bltas te 'grengs la nam mkha' la rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dmigs pa'i tshul bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la sogs pa mi zad pa'i rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa mngon du
[\[314a.7\]]bsams te srad bu'i thog ma grogs kyis 'dzin du bcug la shar phyogs su brkyang ngo /_/de bzhin du lho phyogs nas byang phyogs su brkyang ste de ni nam mkha' la rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bsam pa'o/_/de ltar nam mkha' la rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sems kyis bsams nas phyis sa la
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]dkyil 'khor bri ba na rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor de'i gzugs brnyan lta bur shes par bya'o/_/de ltar nam mkha' la dkyil 'khor sems kyis bsams pa la srad bu bre cing gos she na/_nam mkha' la rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bsam pa'i mtshan mar brtag pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas srad bu gnyis pa
[\[314b.2\]]ni/_rang gis blangs nas zhes pa ni srad bu dang po de dkyil 'khor snga ma'i dman ma yin pas brer mi rung ba'i phyir tshon sna lnga'i skud pa gzhan zhig blangs nas dkyil 'khor phyi ma bri ba'i don to/_/de nyid du/_de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran zhing /_/shar phyogs bltas te bre bar bya/_/zhes pa ni dkyil
[\[314b.3\]]'khor mi 'khrul bar gtan la dbab pa'i phyir dbus nas rgya gram du thig btab ste dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bab par phur bus btsugs la de nas srad bu de blta ba ste dbus kyi phur bu la brtod la grwa bzhi gtan la dbab par bya'o/_/de ltar gtan la phab nas grwa bzhi'i mtshan mar yang phur bu bzhi

[\[319a.4\]]de'i phyag rgya pad+ma'o/_/brtse ba chen po ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'o/_/pad+ma kha ma bye ba ni spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang khyad par bstan pa'o/_/gos dkar gyon pa ni yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/'od zer dag gis bskor ba yi/_/zhes pa ni ye shes kyi 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa'o/_/dpa' bo ni
[\[319a.5\]]sus kyang zil gyis mi non pa'o/_/de yi drung du blo can gyis/_/rig sngags lha mo drags ldan ma/_/gser gyi kha dog lta bu can/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/_/lag pa g.yon pas pri yang ku'i/_/snye ma yid 'ong mdzes par bri/_/zhes pa ni mthu chen thob kyi drung du lha mo grags 'dzin zhes bya ba bri
[\[319a.6\]]ba ste/_de la grags 'dzin zhes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi grags pa rnams 'dzin pa'o/_/de'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu ni mtshan nyid do/_/lag pa g.yon pas pri yang ku'i/_/snye ma yid 'ong 'dzin pa zhes pa ni lha mo de'i phyag rgya'o/_/sgrol ma yi ni nye 'khor du/_/blo dang ldan pa gos dkar mo/_/zhes
[\[319a.7\]]bya ba ni gos dkar mo'am dkar bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i lha mo der bri ba ste dkar bar gnas pa ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la gnas pa'o/_/sgrol ma'i nye 'khor du bri ba'i lha mo sgrol ma de sems can rnams sgrol zhing las thams cad byed pa 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi/_chos kyi dbyings

[\[319b.1\]]rnam par dag pa la bsnyen par byed par bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/thor tshugs can la gos dkar gyon/_/lag na pad+ma thogs par bri/_/zhes pa ni gos dkar po ni yongs su dag pa'i mtshan ma'o/_/lag na pad+ma ni phyag rgya pad+ma thogs pa'o/_/thor tshugs ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no/_/blo dang ldan pas

[\[319b.4\]]por bstan pa'o/_/pad+ma dkar pos rnam par brgyan/_/zhes pa ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par dkar bas brgyan pa'o/_/'bar ba'i phreng can ni shes bya dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa sreg par byed pa'i ye shes can te des bsregs na chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa thob

[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]'khor 'di dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sdud pa'i sgor gyur par shes par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi lho phyogs su/_/byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams kyi/_/phyag rgya yid bzhin nor bu zhes/_/grags pa bskal pa chen po can/_/re ba

[\[320b.1\]]su rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/mtha' yas 'jug pa rgya chen zhes pa ni sems can gyi don du mtha' yas par rgyu ba ste de yang rgya che ba'i rgyu'o/_/rdo rjer bcas zhes pa ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'chang ba'o/_/'od gzer dag gis bskor ba ni ye shes kyi 'od 'phro bas bskor ba'o/_/de yi g.yas su

[\[321a.1\]]'dren cing 'dzud par byed pa'i mtshan ma can no/_/yang na rgyal po'i 'khor gyi phul yin pas gdug pa dang ma rungs pa rnams gzung zhing 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/rang gi pho nya rnams kyis bskor/_/zhes pa ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma de nyid kyi 'khor mang ga gzhug pa la sogs

[\[321b.1\]]zhes pa ni 'khor phal pa dang khro bo grangs med pas bskor ba'o/_/lag pa stong phrag brgya dag ni/_/zhes pa lam gyi yan lag brgya stong du mas sems can rnams 'phags pa'i lam la 'dzud pa'am/_yan lag de rnams kyis lam gyi sgrib pa mang po sel ba'i mtshan ma'o/_/mtshon cha

[\[322a.1\]]sgrib pa sel ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o/_/mkhrang bag phyin ci ma log par yongs su grub pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin yin pas brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'o/_/gzhon nu'i gzugs ni bar chad med pa'i lam la dang por zhugs pas lam rgyas pa'i mtshan ma ste de bas na bar chad

[\[322a.3\]]med pa'i lam rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba bri ba'i bye brag gsungs pa ste/_zad pa'i dus dang 'drar gnas zhes pa ni zad pa'i tshe nyi ma dang zla ba med pas de mun nag tu gyur te khro bo de'i kha dog mun pa dang 'dra ba nag por bri zhes pa'i don to/_/de ltar nang du bri ba

[\[322b.1\]]no/_/shar phyogs su bri ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad pas sngar byang chub kyi shing drung du mngon par byang chub par bstan pa'o/_/gser gyi kha dog ni rgyas pa'i mtshan ma ste bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro/_/'bar dang bcas pa ni kun du sangs rgyas

[\[322b.7\]]'dom gang ba ni kun du sangs rgyas pa la shes bya dang nyon mongs pa sreg pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o/_/mtshungs med ni rnam pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pas tshad 'di tsam mo zhes gzung zhing gzhal du med pa'o/_/de yi g.yas su lha mo ni/_/rig sngags mdzod spu zhes grags pa/_/
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]pad+ma'i steng na 'dug pa ste/_/dung zla kun da lta bu'i mdog_/lag na yid bzhin nor bu thogs/_/re ba kun rdzogs byed pa bri/_/zhes pa ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi g.yas rol byang phyogs su mdzod spu zhes bya ba'i rig ma bri ba ste/_sangs rgyas kyi smin mtshams na skyes bu

[\[349b.3\]]gyi mig mkhan rgyal po yis/_/'jig rten ling tog bsal ba bzhin/_/zhes pa ni/_dpe ste/_de ltar mig gi sman pa'i rgyal pos 'jig rten pa rnams kyi mig gi rab rib bsal te gzugs la sogs pa'i rang dngos ji lta ba nyid du 'dug pa mi mthong
[\[349b.4\]]ba las mthong bar byas pa bzhin du/_rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang bu khyod kyi ma rig pa chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug pa mi shes pa las shes par bya'o zhes pa'o/_/de nas me long blangs nas su/_/chos kyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya/_/
[\[349b.5\]]chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/_/zhes pa ni/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched la sogs pa'i chos rnams gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ste/_bltar yang snang la yang dag par brtags na dngos po yod pa ma yin pa'o/_/dang zhing zhes pa
[\[349b.6\]]ni/_'di ltar phung po la sogs pa'i chos rnams phung po'i rang bzhin du dmigs su med pas dang ba zhes pa'o/_/dag pa zhes pa ni/_shes bya dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang bral ba'o/_/rnyog pa med pa'i sgrib pa dang de dag gi bag chags kyang
[\[349b.7\]]med ces pa'o/_/gzung du med cing brjod du med/_/ces pa ni/_de lta bu'i stong pa'i rang bzhin la rnam par shes pa drug gis gzung du med cing tshig gis brjod pa las 'das pa'o/_/rgyu dang las las byung ba ste/_zhes pa ni/_phung
[\[350a\]]
[\[350a.1\]]po la sogs pa'i chos rnams rang bzhin gyis yod pa'i rang bzhin ma yin gyi/_rgyu dang las las byung bas gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ste/_yod pa ma yin pas brjod du med pa la sogs pa'i tshig gong ma rnams dang sbyar ro/_/ngo bo nyid med
[\[350a.2\]]gnas med pa/_/de ltar chos 'di shes nas su/_/zhes pa ni/_gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bas rang bzhin med pa'o/_/rgyu dang rkyen las byung bas skad cig ma'i char mi gnas par shes pa ste/_chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid de ltar shes nas de lta bu'i tshul du sgom
[\[350a.3\]]pa'i shes rab kyis sgoms shig ces pa'o/_/sems can don ni mnyam med byos/_/zhes pa nas/_chos kyi dung ni bla med pa/_/zhes pa'i bar ni/_de ltar bdag gi don phun sum tshogs nas gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par byos shig ces pa ste gong du
[\[350a.4\]]bshad zin to/_/sangs rgyas sras su skye zhes pa ni/_khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes las skyes so zhes pa'o/_/som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing /_/dog pa med pa'i sems kyis khyod/_/ces pa ni/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
[\[350a.5\]]zhing sems can gyi don bya ba de ltar yin nam ma yin snyam pa'i the tshom dang yid gnyis mi skye ba dang /_'khor rnams la bag tshab med par 'jig rten pa rnams la gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul gyi chos rab tu sgrogs shig ces pa'o/_/de ltar byas na sangs
[\[350a.6\]]rgyas la/_/phan thogs byas pa gzo zhes bya/_/zhes pa ni/_de ltar sems can gyi don byas na sangs rgyas rnams kyi bya ba byas pas byas pa dran zhing sangs rgyas la lan ldon par bshad do zhes pa'o/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang /_/khyod la rnam pa kun du
[\[350a.7\]]srung /_/zhes pa ni/_dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor grwa bzhir rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhi bkod pa dang /_pad+ma'i 'dab ma la bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyang las byas pa don yod do snyam nas srung bar byed do zhes pa'o/_/de nas slob ma de
[\[350b\]]
[\[350b.1\]]bslangs la/_/sngags pa snying rjer gyur pa yi/_/zhes pa nas/_/shin tu nges pa'i yid kyis ni/_/de dag thams cad khas blang ngo /_/zhes pa'i bar gyis slob ma la dam tshig bstan pa ste/_de yang sngon dam tshig mnos pa dang ma mnos pa gnyis ka la bstan no/_/
[\[350b.2\]]de la slob dpon dam tshig bzhi dang lnga dag tu ldan la/_las dang bya ba dag la sbyar ba rgyud la sogs pa dang dam tshig shes shing mnos zin pa la bstan ci dgos she na/_'jig rten na rgyal po rnams kyang rgyal chos su bya ba rnams snga nas kyang shes shing srung mod
[\[350b.3\]]kyi/_nam rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i tshe na/_yang slob dpon la sogs pas bstan zhing gsol bar byed do/_/de bzhin du 'dir yang snga nas kyang dam tshig 'di rnams srung mod kyi/_chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i chos kyis bstan par bya'o/_/
[\[350b.4\]]gnyis su na yang dang yang du bstan na brtan par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas slob ma de bslangs la/_/sngags pa snying rjer gyur pa yi/_/yid kyis nang du bcug nas ni/_/de la dam tshig bstan par bya/_/zhes pa ni/_me long dang 'khor lo la sogs
[\[350b.5\]]pa bstan pa'i gnas de nas slob ma de bslang ste slob dpon gyis slob ma'i gdugs bzung nas dkyil 'khor dang po'i sgo khyud kyi nang du khyud kyi nang der bzhag nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i dam tshig rnams bstan par bya zhes pa'o/_/de ring phan chad bu khyod
[\[350b.6\]]kyis/_/dam pa'i chos dang byang chub sems/_/srog gi phyir yang nga phyin chad/_/yongs su gtang bar mi bya'o/_/zhes pa ni/_dam pa'i chos btang ba yang rnam pa gsum gyis 'gyur te/_theg pa chen po las log par lta ba dang /_chos
[\[350b.7\]]smra ba la mngon du dbang za zhing skur pa 'debs pa dang /_nyin re zhing dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang /_sems pa dang /_sgom pa dang /'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_mchod pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las gang yang rung ba zhig ma byas na
[\[351a\]]
[\[351a.1\]]dam pa'i chos gtang ba zhes bya ste/_de rnams khyod kyis srog gi phyir yang mi gtong ngo zhes pa'o/_/de nas gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems gtang bar mi bya'o zhes sbyar te/_byang chub kyi sems rnam pa
[\[351a.2\]]bzhi las sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir bdag sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces pa'i smon lam gyi sems dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rtag tu bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'i 'jug pa'i sems mi gtong ba la bya'o/_/khyod kyis ser
[\[351a.3\]]sna mi bya'o zhes sbyar te chos dang nor bdag la bdog cing gzhan la byin par rigs pa las mi sbyin par mi bya'o/_/gang sems can la gnod pa mi bya'o zhes te/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid gsum gyi sgo nas sems can rnams
[\[351a.4\]]la 'phral gyi gnod pa dang yun gyi gnod pa mi bya zhes pa'o/_/slob mas bla ma'i rkang pa la/_/dad cing gus par phyag byas nas/_/shin tu nges pa'i yid kyis ni/_/de dag thams cad khas blang ngo /_/zhes pa ni/_gong du slob
[\[351a.5\]]dpon gyis dam tshig bsgo ba de rnams lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid gsum gyi sgo nas sgyu med par khas blang ngo zhes pa ste lus kyis/_slob mas bla ma'i rkang pa la/_/dad cing gus par phyag byas nas/_/zhes pa'o/_/ngag gis/_de
[\[351a.6\]]dag thams cad khas blang ngo /_/zhes pa ste bka' stsal pa bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smra bar bya'o/_/sems kyis/_shin tu nges pa'i yid kyis ni/_/zhes pa ste slob dpon gyi ngo tsam khas blang ba ma yin gyi/_sems thag pa
[\[351a.7\]]nas so zhes pa'o/_/de yan chad kyis snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnams rdzogs so//_//
